summary: WaywardKnight\'s Characters featuring Ysolda of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=32] WaywardKnight\'s Ysolda [/b] [/size] 


[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11413-1-1330390630.jpg [/img]


[b] Version 1.0 features : [/b] 

Two new looks for Ysolda of Whiterun, with more on the way. 

[color=red] - Update #4 (2.03.12) : [/color] For whatever reason v4 was not uploaded to the site. That will be corrected ASAP.

[color=red] - Update #3 (1.03.12) : [/color] A fourth Ysolda is now available for download. 

[color=red] - Update #2 (28.02.12) : [/color] The third version, Ysolda v3, is up. Feel free to leave comments or requests, even an endorsement, if you like what you see.  

[color=red] - Update #1 (27.02.12) : [/color] A second variant, Ysolda v2, is now available. Also, I have posted a new topic for future requests. 

[size=6] Savegames and presets available upon demand! [/size]

[b] To install : [/b] 

Simply copy and paste into your [i] skyrim/Data [/i] folder.


[b] To uninstall : [/b]

Delete Ysolda.esp and the file [i] 00013bab.nif [/i], which can be found in : 

[i] C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm [/i]   


[b] To switch between versions : [/b]

1. Uncheck Ysolda.esp in the Nexus Mod Manager or default Bethesda launcher. Once that\'s complete, close the launcher. 

2. Find and delete the following files: 

[i] - Ysolda.esp 
- 0001414d.nif [/i]  

3. Install the version you\'d like to use.  


[b] My other mods : [/b]

[b] WKC - Ralof : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11145

[b] WKC - Hadvar : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11136 

[b] WKC - Ulfric Stormcloak : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11404


[b] Recommended mods for female characters : [/b]  

[b] XCE (Xenius Character Enhancement) : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356

[b] Better females by Bella : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

[b] DIMONIZED UNP female body : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709 


[b] [size=6] More to come. [/b] [/size]
author: WaywardKnight
